sqlMap.statement: SELECT CATG.DS_ORD_LINE_CATG_CD , CATG.DS_ORD_LINE_CATG_DESC_TXT FROM DS_ORD_LINE_CATG CATG , DS_ORD_LINE_PROC_DFN PROC WHERE CATG.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND CATG.DS_ORD_LINE_DRCTN_CD = #dsOrdLineDrctnCd# AND CATG.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND CATG.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PROC.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND CATG.DS_ORD_LINE_CATG_CD = PROC.DS_ORD_LINE_CATG_CD AND PROC.DS_ORD_TP_CD = #dsOrdTpCd# AND PROC.ACTV_FLG = #actvFlg# AND PROC.EFF_FROM_DT <= #ordTimeStamp# AND (PROC.EFF_THRU_DT >= #ordTimeStamp# OR PROC.EFF_THRU_DT IS NULL) AND PROC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
SELECT OLS.ORD_LINE_SRC_CD , OLS.ORD_LINE_SRC_NM FROM ORD_LINE_SRC OLS WHERE OLS.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND OLS.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY OLS.ORD_LINE_SRC_SORT_NUM
SELECT PC.PRC_CATG_CD FROM PRC_CATG PC WHERE PC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND PC.PRC_CATG_NM = #prcCatgNm# AND PC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
